scripts.lambda:develop-mds-daily: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name develop-mds-daily --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-daily.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-prod-mds-daily: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-prod-mds-daily --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-daily.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-sandbox-mds-daily: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-sandbox-mds-daily --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-daily.zip
